member.name: T:MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.IMsmqEndpoint
member.summary: An extension of the IEndpoint interface for the additional support of Message Queue backed endpoints

member.name: M:MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.IMsmqEndpoint.Open(System.Messaging.QueueAccessMode)
member.param: The access mode for the queue

member.name: P:MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.IMsmqEndpoint.QueuePath
member.summary: The path of the message queue for the endpoint. Suitable for use with .Open to access a message queue.

member.name: T:MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.MsmqEndpoint
member.summary: A MessageQueueEndpoint is an implementation of an endpoint using the Microsoft Message Queue service.

member.name: M:MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.MsmqEndpoint.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a instance with the specified URI string.

member.name: M:MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.MsmqEndpoint.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary: Initializes a instance with the specified URI.

member.name: M:MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.MsmqEndpoint.#ctor(System.Messaging.MessageQueue)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class using the specified queue

member.name: M:MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.MsmqEndpoint.op_Implicit(System.String)~MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.MsmqEndpoint
member.param: A string identifying the URI of the message queue (ex. msmq://localhost/my_queue)
member.returns: An instance of the MessageQueueEndpoint class

member.name: M:MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.MsmqEndpoint.op_Implicit(MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.MsmqEndpoint)~System.String
member.summary: Returns the URI string for the message queue endpoint.
member.param: The endpoint to use to generate the URI string
member.returns: A URI string that identifies the message queue endpoint

member.name: P:MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.MsmqEndpoint.QueuePath
member.summary: The path of the message queue for the endpoint. Suitable for use with .Open to access a message queue.

member.name: P:MassTransit.ServiceBus.MSMQ.MsmqEndpoint.Uri
member.summary: The address of the endpoint, in URI format
